page.title: 05Boundary Farm and Hill Farm
page.content: Boundary Farm covers 96 acres.It has two full time workers, the tenant and one who lives at Smythemoor ;The farm has 9 fields of pasture and silage grass.The farm is a dairy farm with 65 Friesian cows, 1 calf and 8 beef cattle.There is 1 cat on the farm which is a farm cat.There are 4 hay bays all of which are filled in the summer.When empty they are used for storing implements and fertilizers.The milking parlour is quite small.The farmer has only one silage pit beside which is an effluent tank. The farmer's wife is our .1 teacher. Hill Farm is unoccupied at present and the land farmed by a group of 6 farmers completing the beef scheme of the previous tenant.It covers 116 acres with 70 acres of winter wheat,12 acres of potatoes,3 acres of winter barley and rough pasture land.
